response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product has been meticulously designed to provide exceptional value and performance. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product at a special price of $18,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate, and I believe it aligns well with your budget and requirements. If you're interested in proceeding with this offer, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 18000}
